head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LYNCH, VIRGINIA (NEE MOORE)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LYNCH, VIRGINIA (NEE MOORE)

block.p: LYNCH-Virginia (nee Moore). 80. ''It was enough for me to walk the same bright Earth as you.'' Survived by loving daughter Ellen Lynch Ivins; grandchildren Bridget Ivins-Young, Owen A. Ivins, Siobhan V. McGriff, Patrick E. Lynch; sister Mary Moore Tiffany; and brother Robert Emmett Moore. Visiting Ortiz Funeral Home, 21 1st Ave., Monday and Tuesday. Mass St. Theresa's Church, 141 Henry St.
